analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS status is 41, signaling a transition to a Neutral regime. Momentum pushed the score to 41 as VIX (fear index) stabilized and DXY (dollar strength/liquidity) cooled. While liquidity remains stable, potential regulatory cost mandates for data centers pose a risk to tech margins. Rising Gold suggests deep defensive hedging persists. Maintain a balanced neutral stance while monitoring regulatory headlines.

reports.EN: GMS status is 41, signaling a transition to a Neutral regime. Momentum pushed the score to 41 as VIX (fear index) stabilized and DXY (dollar strength/liquidity) cooled. While liquidity remains stable, potential regulatory cost mandates for data centers pose a risk to tech margins. Rising Gold suggests deep defensive hedging persists. Maintain a balanced neutral stance while monitoring regulatory headlines.
reports.ES: El GMS es 41, indicando un rÃ©gimen Neutral. El impulso empujÃ³ la puntuaciÃ³n a 41 gracias a la estabilidad del VIX (Ã­ndice de miedo) y un DXY (fuerza del dÃ³lar) mÃ¡s plano. Aunque la liquidez es estable, los posibles costos regulatorios en centros de datos son un riesgo para la tecnologÃ­a. El alza del oro sugiere cautela subyacente; mantenga una postura equilibrada mientras vigila las noticias regulatorias.

reports.ID: GMS berada di 41, menandakan transisi ke rezim Netral. Momentum mendorong skor ke 41 seiring stabilnya VIX (indeks ketakutan) dan DXY (kekuatan dolar/likuiditas). Meski likuiditas stabil, potensi mandat biaya pusat data dapat menekan marjin sektor teknologi. Kenaikan harga emas menunjukkan lindung nilai defensif tetap aktif. Tetap waspada dalam posisi netral sambil memantau berita regulasi.

news.title: Trump trade adviser Navarro says administration may force data center builders like Meta to 'internalize' costs

ID: Penasihat perdagangan Trump Navarro mengatakan pemerintahan dapat memaksa pembangun pusat data seperti Meta untuk 'menginternalisasi' biaya

Beberapa pembuat kebijakan Eropa menyambut hangat kata-kata Menteri Luar Negeri AS Rubio, yang lain tetap berhati-hati
Kebutuhan pokok konsumen melonjak pada tahun 2026. Inilah yang mendorong lonjakan di sektor ini
